ItemWeapon.name: plasma grenade
ItemWeapon.description: A grenade that uses a micro fusion pellet to convert a deuterium shell into a highly energy shockwave of superheated plasma. Do not attempt to eat, fuck or use this weapon in close quarters. 2AP Does 12-24 thermokinetic damage.

missText.text: TARGET is unscathed by the detonation

hitText.text: TARGET suffers VALUE damage in a plasma explosion
